'''Torkoal''' ([[List of Japanese Pokémon names|Japanese]]: '''コータス''' ''Cotoise'') is a {{type|Fire}} {{OBP|Pokémon|species}} introduced in [[Generation III]].

It is not known to [[Evolution|evolve]] into or from any other Pokémon.

==Biology==
Torkoal is a tortoise-like, quadruped Pokémon. It has a large black rock-like shell with holes that glow with a red warmth. Its skin is reddish brown with gray-black bands on its legs and neck. It has a long neck and its eyes seem permanently closed. Torkoal lives in {{DL|List of Pokémon by habitat|Mountain Pokémon|mountains,}} where it looks for large deposits of coal. It uses the coal to fill the hollow spaces in its shell, and then burns it for energy.

Because coal is Torkoal's source of energy, it becomes immobile once it runs out of coal to burn. A Torkoal is healthy if the smoke spouting from its shell has tremendous velocity. When it blows out smoke from its nostrils and the top of its back, it sounds like a locomotive horn. It blows out black smoke before fleeing and while being attacked.

==In the anime==
[[File:Ash Torkoal.png|220px|left|thumb|Torkoal in the {{pkmn|anime}}]]
===Major appearances===
====[[Ash's Torkoal]]====
In ''[[AG058|All Torkoal, No Play]]'', the {{type|Steel}} Pokémon of the [[Valley of Steel]] were picking on a wild Torkoal which, after helping it defeat a {{p|Steelix}}, {{Ash}} then captured.

====Other====
Torkoal debuted in ''[[AG055|Poetry Commotion!]]'', under the ownership of [[Lavaridge Town]] [[Gym Leader]] [[Flannery]]. Flannery used her Torkoal in a Gym match against Ash and battled {{AP|Pikachu}} and {{AP|Treecko}}. It was able to defeat both before losing to {{AP|Corphish}}. Flannery's Torkoal reappeared in flashbacks in ''[[AG058|All Torkoal, No Play]]'' and ''[[AG075|Whiscash and Ash]]''.

===Minor appearances===
A Torkoal appeared in ''[[DP056|The Keystone Pops!]]'' during Team Rocket's motto.

A Torkoal appeared in ''[[XY078|Lights! Camera! Pika!]]'', under the ownership of [[Frank]] where it helped in the making of the movie by billow black smoke for effects.

Three Trainers' Torkoal appeared in ''[[SM034|A Crowning Moment of Truth!]]''.

In ''[[PS199|Adding It Up with Plusle & Minun II]]'', a Torkoal appears as the main Pokémon of the [[Team Magma]] {{tc|Magma Admin|admin}} [[Tabitha]], who trusts him enough to have him hold the {{DL|Colored orbs|Blue Orb}} while they were given an order to guard the artifact. Tabitha's Torkoal has the special ability to use his smoke to hypnotize and poison enemies.

The Battle Factory rented a Torkoal which was stolen by [[Guile Hideout]] in ''[[PS334|The Final Battle VII]]''.

A Torkoal appeared in ''[[PAXY30|Pinsir Changes]]''.

==Trivia==
* Torkoal has the highest base {{stat|Defense}} stat of all {{type|Fire}} Pokémon.
* It is tied with {{p|Slugma}}, {{p|Litwick}}, and {{me|Camerupt}} for the lowest base {{stat|Speed}} stat of all Fire-type Pokémon.

===Origin===
Torkoal is essentially a {{wp|giant tortoise}} with a {{wp|furnace}} or a {{wp|kitchen stove}} with four openings within its shell. Its shell also appears to be a lump of burning coal.

====Name origin====
Torkoal and Cotoise are a combination of ''tortoise'' and ''{{wp|coal}}''.
